XenotypeDef.label: Mechalit Gen
XenotypeDef.description: A standard gene that is implanted in many fighters of the Mechalit faction. It grants partial immunity to toxins, increased regeneration, and immunity to diseases.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: A standard gene that is implanted in many fighters of the Mechalit faction. It grants partial immunity to toxins, increased regeneration, and immunity to diseases.
